statements.first: Artisan Education exists to ignite the natural curiosity of every child, empowering them to explore their creativity, grow their skills, and enjoy the process of learning.
statements.second: We believe that nurturing each child's unique potential leads to confident, capable individuals ready to shape their own futures with joy and imagination.

inclusiveEducation.title: Personalized Learning Journeys
inclusiveEducation.description: Students select projects that match their interests, keeping learning engaging.

globalImpact.title: Teacher as a Mentor
globalImpact.description: Educators guide and support, fostering collaboration and exploration.

LearningPlatform.sectionSubtitle: An educational platform designed to make learning robotics and programming engaging, interactive, and accessible for all skill levels.

selfPaced.title: Self-Paced Learning
selfPaced.description: Students learn at their own pace with adaptive challenges that adjust to their skill level. No step-by-step instructions allow for developing problem-solving skills

ide.title: Built-in IDE & Simulation
ide.description: Our platform allows students to simulate electronic circuits, write code and run projects. Simulation feature make it possible to learn engeneering without hardware

dashboard.title: Project based learning
dashboard.description: Students actively engage in real-world projects, applying their knowledge to solve practical problems rather than just memorizing theories.

curriculum.title: Teacher Dashboard
curriculum.description: Analytics and progress tracking for teachers. Monitor student performance, identify areas where students need help

HardwareKits.heading: PiBody kit
HardwareKits.description: Our comprehensive hardware kit is designed to make learning electronics and programming engaging and accessible. With carefully curated components and detailed guides, students can start building real projects from day one.

modular.title: Quick and Simple Prototyping
modular.description: Students can quickly create and test their ideas, encouraging experimentation and iteration.

scalable.title: Optimized for Scaling
scalable.description: Start with basics and add modules as students progress, providing a gradual learning curve.

prototyping.title: Modular Design
prototyping.description: Our kit contain plug-and-play modules that easily connect and reconfigure for various projects.

Stats.heading: Our Impact in Numbers
Stats.subheading: Transforming education through innovative technology and hands-on learning

partnerSchool.heading: Join Us
partnerSchool.description: Become a partner school and be part of our family

description.heading: Passionate Educators and Engineers
description.paragraph1: Our team consists of experienced educators and engineers united by a common mission — to transform STEM education and make it accessible to every child.
description.paragraph2: We believe that practical experience and a creative approach to learning help children not only absorb knowledge, but also develop critical thinking, problem-solving skills, and innovative thinking.

Testimonials.sectionSubtitle: What students, teachers, and school administrators say about us

student.name: Amiraly Bekturganov
student.quote: At first, I thought it would be too hard, but the projects on Artisan actually made things clearer. I liked figuring things out myself — it’s not just copying code, you really build stuff that works. Sometimes it was challenging, but that made it feel real.

teacher.name: Adilbek Berdikhodjaev
teacher.quote: Artisan is a fantastic resource for STEM and robotics. The magnetic connections for modules eliminate wire clutter, making everything easy to connect. The team truly understands modern students! The lessons are well-structured, and the instructions are very clear. Though still in development, Artisan Education's potential is clear. I'm excited to see how it grows and look forward to new updates!

principal.name: Sherkhan Sauyrtayev
principal.quote: “What stood out to us with Artisan was how quickly students got engaged. The platform doesn’t rely on constant teacher explanation — it encourages independent thinking, which is rare in most tools. And for our teachers, it’s a relief to have structured content that actually works.”
